context: The Finnish verb 'ehdottaa' means to suggest, propose or offer something. It can be used in various contexts such as suggesting ideas (ehdotan ideoita), proposing times for meetings (ehdotti uutta ajankohtaa), or offering suggestions. The word follows the basic conjugation pattern of -aa ending verbs in Finnish: present tense 'ehdotan' (I suggest), third person singular 'ehdottaa' (he/she suggests), past tense 'ehdoin' (I suggested) etc.
